name: Bleach: Infinite Brawl
description:
This game is based on the worldview of the original anime, featuring accurate and detailed reproduction of scenes and characters. It integrates new gameplays with settings of the original anime to offer exciting gaming experiences boasting the exact style of the original.


Classic Battles on Your Fingertip
Highly accurate reproduction of plots, characters, skills and music, presenting you classic battles in which you can control characters from the original anime!


Have Showdowns via Immersive Fighting
Magnificent special effects and blast damage help you win every battle!


Play Master-Hand Battles for Prestigious Honor
Engage in real-time PVP fights and master-hand battles to relive scenes from the original anime!
